data.text: @LancelotLinkSpy @1zzyzyx1 @MiaforSC They have a degree in trumpism, the new science in deceiving!

@LancelotLinkSpy @MiaforSC I am a teacher and I fully support the right for parents to be active in educational decisions. Knowing best practices and methods are very different than the knowing the actual content that is taught. Politics has no place in education. We need to return to the basics.

@MiaforSC Public health should be run by medical personnel & scientists, just like our schools should be run by educators. These fascist GOP are making medical, educational, etc. decisions for all of us, & they don't have degrees in the fields! #Fascism

@MiaforSC Unfortunately, Henry seems more pro infection than preventing it. His attitude changed about the Ukraine as Russian Oligarchs supporting the GOP got their assets frozen, so this push back against a healthy SC must get him💰, just like his attacks on public education!
@MiaforSC My uncle became one of SC's covid casualties. 😔 Get them out of there! Good luck with your run! 🍀

@MiaforSC Elected officials should be watching out for those they serve. Instead we got lies to justify cashing in &not doing his job. Promoting ignorance, anti-science propaganda,& division cost us many more lives. @henrymcmaster doesn't get he's following Putin's plan by following Trump? https://t.co/8ukOBRyVUx
@MiaforSC Dude nobody is making anyone wear a mask in SC….what the heck is this? They don’t even work! Hire new PR

This is just one more thing South Carolina is falling behind on and our disabled residents are bearing the consequences. As governor, I will implement policies to ensure more South Carolinians have accessible and affordable healthcare.
